attributes.action:
Close UK Borders NOW!
Protect the UK from Covid 19
attributes.additional_details:
Our lives are just returning to some normality. 
Boris, protect the UK people. 
Look at India. It is so frightening and sad to see what COVID is doing there. 
Protect us. The UK citizens. Your voters. Our country. 
All UK arrivals should face mandatory government controlled quarantine. 
We all want to enjoy our lives and live safely while the world gets control of this pandemic. 
The country will thank you and respect your action.
attributes.background: Immediately enforce mandatory government controlled quarantine for all UK arrivals

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564165
